sources.title: Rock All Night (1957)
sources.description: Abby Dalton, Dick Miller, Russell Johnson, Mel Welles, Ed Nelson pancoligo

metadata.Plot: A rock and roll film intended for the drive-in, set in a bar where a new singer is auditioning. However, things get complicated when a pair of criminals turn up and take hostages to hold off the police. The payed-off local heavy-guy turns out to be useless, as does a professional boxer, but the situation is resolved by the plucky short guy with a chip on his shoulder (Dick Miller).
metadata.Writer: Charles B. Griffith, David P. Harmon
metadata.Actors: Dick Miller, Russell Johnson, Abby Dalton
